name: Furimukeba Tonari Ni
overview: Furimukeba Tonari Ni is a visual novel that tells the story of a little girl that lost her father and is alone in the world and one day discover an old pot that contains a blone fairy called Lapis Lazuli Ruri that likes ice creams and will help the girl in finding love. Furimukeba Tonari ni is a port of a PC adult visual novel called Shin Ruriiro no Yuki: Furimukeba Tonari ni. This port has been released a year later and has all the adult scenes removed and story adjusted to work without them.
